title.value: Lightweight landing page with a reductive visual language.

value.value: A ready-to-go personal landing page for professionals who care about design precision, accessibility, and performance. Built without mockup-to-code handoff.
Yes. A shared, web-standard-based environment where designers handle layout and style, while developers focus on complex components and logic.
Each new project or update triggers a â€œtranslationâ€ across two worlds with different priorities, languages, and tools.
Itâ€™s an inefficient handoff that creates friction and slows everything down.
A ready-to-go personal landing page for professionals who care about design precision, accessibility, and performance. Built without mockup-to-code handoff.

formula.value: Designers create pixel-perfect mockups in Figma.
Developers rebuild everything from scratch in React, Vue, or Svelte.
